messageValues.message:
=Based on the provided file name and file contents, extract out ...

# headline-style description

A very short, headline-style description (7-10 words). This will be used to finish the sentence "This chunk is from" so start it with "an" or "a"... example output

an SEC filing on ACME corp's performance in Q2 2023

# document summary

Also extract out a 1 sentence description of what the document is about and classify the document according to the below fields.

Only output JSON in the following format

{
"document_headline_description":"<ADD>",
"document_summary":"<ADD>",
{{ $json.list_of_fields ? $json.list_of_fields : "" }}
}

If you are unsure of any of these, just output N/A in the field.

{{ $json.list_of_fields ? $json.filterPromptInstructions : "" }}

conditions.leftValue:
={{ [
  // Documents / Presentations / Spreadsheets
  "application/x-t602",                          // 602
  "application/x-abiword",                       // abw, zabw
  "image/cgm",                                   // cgm
  "application/x-appleworks",                    // cwk
  "application/msword",                          // doc
  "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document", // docx
  "application/vnd.ms-word.document.macroEnabled.12", // docm
  "application/msword",                          // dot
  "application/vnd.ms-word.template.macroEnabled.12", // dotm
  "application/x-hwp",                           // hwp
  "application/vnd.apple.keynote",               // key
  "application/vnd.lotus-wordpro",               // lwp
  "application/x-mw",                            // mw
  "application/x-mcw",                           // mcw
  "application/vnd.apple.pages",                 // pages
  "application/vnd.powerbuilder6",               // pbd
  "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint",               // ppt
  "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint.presentation.macroEnabled.12", // pptm
  "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.presentationml.presentation", // pptx
  "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint",               // pot
  "application/vnd.ms-powerpoint.template.macroEnabled.12", // potm
  "application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.presentationml.template", // potx
  "application/rtf",                             // rtf
  "application/vnd.stardivision.draw",           // sda
  "application/vnd.stardivision.impress",        // sdd
  "application/sdp",                             // sdp
  "application/vnd.stardivision.writer",         // sdw, sgl
  "application/vnd.sun.xml.impress.template",    // sti
  "application/vnd.sun.xml.impress",             // sxi
  "application/vnd.sun.xml.writer",              // sxw
  "application/vnd.sun.xml.writer.template",     // stw
  "application/vnd.sun.xml.writer.global",       // sxg
  "text/plain",                                  // txt
  "application/x-uof",                           // uof
  "application/x-uop",                           // uop
  "application/x-uot",                           // uot
  "application/vnd.stardivision.writer",         // vor
  "application/vnd.wordperfect",                 // wpd
  "application/vnd.ms-works",                    // wps
  "application/xml",                             // xml
  "application/epub+zip",                        // epub

  // Images
  "image/jpeg",                                  // jpg, jpeg
  "image/png",                                   // png
  "image/gif",                                   // gif
  "image/bmp",                                   // bmp
  "image/svg+xml",                               // svg
  "image/tiff",                                  // tiff
  "image/webp",                                  // webp

  // Audio / Video
  "audio/mpeg",                                  // mp3, mpga
  "video/mp4",                                   // mp4
  "video/mpeg",                                  // mpeg
  "audio/mp4",                                   // m4a
  "audio/wav",                                   // wav
  "video/webm",                                  // webm
  "audio/webm"                                   // webm (audio)
].includes($json.mimeType) }}

workflowId.cachedResultName: Multimodal RAG - TheAIAutomators - SOTA RAG Sub-workflow - v1.2 Blueprint
Knowledge Graph - TheAIAutomators - SOTA RAG Sub-workflow - v1.1 Blueprint

value.supabase_row_id: ={{ $('Create Row in Record Manager').isExecuted ? $('Create Row in Record Manager').item.json.id : $('Search Record Manager').item.json.id }}

nodes.name: Send tabular data to vector store?

parameters.content:
## Loop Start
Only Supports Processing 1 File at a time. For parallel imports check out our "RAG at Scale" System

## TODO: Add Webhook
From the Webhook node below

# RAG File Creation & Update
Activate the workflow and then upload files to the Google Drive folder

Note: Google drive Triggers do not fire when you move files in between folders

## TODO
Multimodal RAG sub-workflow must be configured if Multimodal is enabled in the "Set Data" node.

## TODO
GraphRAG sub-workflow must be configured if LightRAG is enabled in the "Set Data" node.

# Record Manager Router

### 0. No Change to Doc
Move to next file

### 1. New Document
Add to Record Manager and Vector Store 

### 2. Changed Document 
Delete old vectors and add new ones

## Rate Limiting - Batch Size
If you run in to Rate Limiting issues with contextual vector embeddings, you will need to reduce this

conditions.keyValue: ={{ $('Create Row in Record Manager').isExecuted ? $('Create Row in Record Manager').first().json.id : $('Search Record Manager').first().json.id }}

parameters.content:
## Loop End
Archive and move to next item

## Rate Limiting
If you run in to LLM Rate Limiting issues with LightRAG processing you can slow down file ingestion here

conditions.keyValue: ={{ $('Create Row in Record Manager').isExecuted ? $('Create Row in Record Manager').first().json.id : $('Search Record Manager').first().json.id }}

parameters.content:
## Rate Limiting - Fall Backs
You can copy the above LLM Chain and output parser and hook up a different API account or different API service. 

The error track from the above node will feed this new node and success will merge into the "Setup Text for Embedding" node

The same can be done for the "Basic LLM Chain within the Contextual Embedding" and the "Create OpenAI Embeddings" calls

# RAG File Deletion
Any files in the Recycling Bin sub-folder will be deleted from the vector store and sub-folder

messageValues.message:
=Based on the provided file name and file contents, extract out ...

# headline-style description

A very short, headline-style description (7-10 words). This will be used to finish the sentence "This chunk is from" so start it with "an" or "a"... example output

an SEC filing on ACME corp's performance in Q2 2023

# document summary

Also extract out a 1 sentence description of what the document is about and classify the document according to the below fields.

Only output JSON in the following format

{
"document_headline_description":"<ADD>",
"document_summary":"<ADD>",
{{ $json.list_of_fields ? $json.list_of_fields : "" }}
}

If you are unsure of any of these, just output N/A in the field.

{{ $json.list_of_fields ? $json.filterPromptInstructions : "" }}

parameters.body:
={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'claude-haiku-4-5-20251001', max_tokens: 300, system: [{ type: 'text', text: '<document>
' + $('Set up Text for Embedding').item.json.content.substring(0, 100000) + '
</document>', cache_control: { type: 'ephemeral' } }], messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'Here is the chunk we want to situate within the whole document:
<chunk>
' + $json.content + '
</chunk>
Please give a short succinct context to situate this chunk within the overall document for the purposes of improving search retrieval of the chunk.

Rules:
- Start your response with "Context:" followed by the contextual summary.
- Keep it to 1-2 sentences maximum.
- Do not include anything else in your response.

Example format:
Context: This section covers the authentication middleware setup within the API gateway architecture chapter.' }] }) }}

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ model: 'claude-haiku-4-5-20251001', max_tokens: 50, system: [{ type: 'text', text: '<document>\n' + $('Set up Text for Embedding').item.json.content.substring(0, 100000) + '\n</document>', cache_control: { type: 'ephemeral' } }], messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'Respond with only the document title.' }] }) }}
